title: [Hornwort Cavern, Tunnel]
description: A steady *drip-drip-drip* echoes off of every facet of the surrounding rock walls, lending a near-deafening reverberation to the cramped, enclosed space.  Directly overhead and continuing down one wall, a deep fissure  proves to be the source of the watery incursion.  A spiderweb of cracks spreading from it lend an air of impending danger to this part of the tunnel.
paths: Obvious exits: southwest, northwest, down, out
